resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156544</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156544</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2709</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">An exploration of coral reefs in the world</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Erforschung der Korallenriffe in der Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une exploration des récifs de corail dans le 
monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma exploração dos recifes corais no mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'esplorazione dei reefs di corallo nel mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εξερεύνηση των κοραλλιογενών υφάλων στον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una exploración de los filones coralinos en el 
mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A presentation which illustrates the location and images of different coral reefs around the world, as well as the temperature and depth of the oceans where they are found.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oceanography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">marine science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coral reefs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Darstellung, das den Standort und die Bilder
der unterschiedlichen Korallenriffe um die Welt, sowie die Temperatur 
und die Tiefe der Ozeane veranschaulicht, in denen sie gefunden 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation qui illustre l'emplacement et 
les images de différents récifs de corail autour du monde, aussi 
bien que la température et la profondeur des océans où elles sont 
trouvées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação que ilustra a posição e as 
imagens de recifes corais diferentes em torno do mundo, as.well.as a 
temperatura e a profundidade dos oceanos onde é encontrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione che illustra la posizione e le 
immagini dei reefs di corallo differenti intorno al mondo, così come 
la temperatura e la profondità degli oceani in cui sono trovate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση που επεξηγούν τη θέση και τις εικόνες 
των διαφορετικών κοραλλιογενών υφάλων σε όλο τον κόσμο, καθώς 
επίσης και η θερμοκρασία και το βάθος των ωκεανών όπου 
βρίσκονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación que ilustra la localización y 
las imágenes de diversos filones coralinos alrededor del mundo, así 
como la temperatura y la profundidad de los océanos en donde él se 
encuentra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ozeanographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Marinewissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Korallenriffe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Océanographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science marine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">récifs de corail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Oceanography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência marinha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recifes corais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Oceanografia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza marina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reefs di corallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ωκεανογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ναυτιλιακές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοραλλιογενείς ύφαλοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Oceanografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia marina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">filones coralinos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
